original_title: Time for issuing train season tickets for school children extended
original_body_lines: Due to the start of the third phase of the first school term on Monday (12), the Railways Department has decided to extend the period for school children to obtain their train season tickets.
Accordingly, the Railways Department has extended this period for school children till next Friday (16).
The Deputy General Manager of Railways said every train station has been informed in this regard.
The third phase of the first school term of government and government-approved private schools for the year 2023 will begin on Monday (12). (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
